Class ZombieSimulation

java.lang.Object
  simzombie.engine.simulations.zombies.ZombieSimulation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Simulation
public class ZombieSimulation
extends java.lang.Object
implements Simulation

Implements the Zombie Simulation Use this class as a model if implementing a new type of simulation

Since:
2011-10-28

updateNumericalAnalysis

public boolean updateNumericalAnalysis(Graph g)
Performs Euler's Numerical Analysis Uses an approximate set of ODEs that the model is based on. Changes to the simulation have since been implemented (such as activity) that no longer mean these ODEs accurately reflect the model.

Specified by:
updateNumericalAnalysis in interface Simulation
Parameters:
g -
Returns:
True if numerical analysis has finished, false otherwise
